name: Metal Mania (JaTYa)
description:
Metal Mania is a short but fairly difficult three level platformer. You play as something(?) and must traverse a world of spikes, bombs and other obstacles, with the goal of collecting the three orbs scattered across each level, allowing you to proceed to the next.

Along the way you will find enhancements, these are short-lasting but useful powerups. Each level has its own unique enhancement that will be necessary either to continue, or sometimes just to reach an orb.
